channel.title: One Way Audio on Asterisk, and other worldly endeavours
channel.description: Recent content in One Way Audio on Asterisk, and other worldly endeavours

item.title: Issues: ast_rtp_senddigit_begin: Don't know how to represent 'f' (one way audio)
item.description: I keep seeing questions like this recently on the mailing list and in the #asterisk IRC channel. “ast_rtp_senddigit_begin: Don’t know how to represent ‘f’ shows up on the console then I get one way audio… * 1.4.25.1, wanpipe 3.3.15.20, zaptel 1.4.12.1, libpri 1.4.7…. any suggestions?” I forget who originally said how to fix it (it was in a mailing list thread that I can’t find right now…), but basically the answer to resolve it was to disable the DTMF detection in the wanpipe driver.
